name: NSBatchUpdateResult
desc: The result returned when executing a batch update request.

items.name: var result: Any?
items.desc: The result of a batch-update request, either the number of updated objects, the identifiers of the updated objects, or a status value.

items.name: var resultType: NSBatchUpdateRequestResultType
items.desc: The type of result that Core Data returns from the request.

items.name: enum NSBatchUpdateRequestResultType
items.desc: Result types for a batch-update request.
